name: Hershey's® White Chocolate Cinnamon Scones
author: Sally Sibthorpe
summary: Delicate sour cream scones flavored with white chocolate and lemon, and studded with cinnamon chips.
ingredients: ¼ cup HERSHEY®'S Cinnamon Chips, melted
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Spray a cookie sheet with non-stick cooking spray
Sift 2 cups flour, 1/4 cup sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt into a large bowl
Cut butter in with a pastry blender or fork until the mixture is resembles cornmeal
Mix in 1/2 cup HERSHEY'S Cinnamon Chips
In a small bowl, whisk together sour cream, egg yolk, and vanilla
Stir in 1/2 cup melted HERSHEY'S HUGS
Mix into flour and butter mixture, and mix until dough comes together in moist clumps
Press dough out on lightly floured surface to form a 8 inch round; cut into 6 wedges
Transfer wedges to prepared baking sheet, spacing 1 inch apart
Bake until scones are crusty on top, and a tester inserted into center comes out clean, about 15 to 20 minutes
Drizzle the scones alternately with 1/4 cup melted HERSHEY'S HUGS and 1/4 melted HERSHEY'S Cinnamon Chips
